review_text: We had an amazing stay! The property was do beautiful snd peaceful, and the house felt so welcoming. We enjoyed the nature and wildlife, especially the deer in the evening. Jerry and Alma paid attention to all the welcoming details and made us feel right at home. Would go back in a second!
Jerry and Alma’s place is our favorite place to stay when we’re in the area. The location is convenient, and it meets all our needs beautifully.

Jerry and Alma’s home was perfect for our family’s stay for Notre Dame graduation! We loved the history of the house and the location on the river. They were great with communication and helped made the weekend go smoothly!
Beautiful home and beautiful location!

The home was beautiful. I love how they incorporated the history of the home.
This place sits beautifully on a river and very close to town.

we really loved the home and the big property! we had a blast made a bon fire grill walked around with our newborn and dogs. the house was awesome a lot of history! Jerry and Alma were super helpful and nice ! highly recommend!
Jerry and Alma were fantastic hosts. Property was well maintained, super cozy and very inviting. We look forward to staying again in the near future.
Was a wonderful place to stay and a beautiful house. Thank you for sharing it!

Jerry and Alma's place was wonderful for our needs this trip!
Check-in was a breeze, and we were delighted by their welcoming note.
The house is conveniently located - minutes from downtown South Bend and from the Notre Dame Campus. The property feels secluded in spite of its proximity to everything, and it was very easy to get to.
The house was spacious, clean, and tidy. There was plenty of room for our small family on this trip, and we'd have room to spread out if we were traveling with a group. The kitchen is spacious and well-equipped. The bathrooms even had commonly forgotten toiletries!
The property has lots of open space and some wooded areas. We weren't feeling adventurous enough to go down to the river, but you certainly could! Our dog loved sniffing around and exploring the space.
Jerry and Alma were easy to get ahold of, and we did take advantage of the opportunity to meet them and learn more about the house. They are extremely friendly and know the area well!
This was a perfect place to celebrate for my daughter and her friends. The space was exactly what we needed. Thank you for being available!

This was my second stay here and due to unfortunate circumstances I had to extend my stay. Tom and his wife Luann were extremely kind and accommodating to me. Just genuinely good people! I would stay here every time I travel back home if I could. Thank you so much for everything!! Still think this place is amazing!

The hosts were extremely friendly and accommodating. They offered us an inflatable mattress and extra sheets so we could all sleep comfortably. The place is comfortable and nice. Still being renovated but it doesn't affect quality of life of the living area. Property is beautiful.

Loved our stay at the Izzy Inn. Hosts were super friendly and responsive even as we arrived late and needed some help with extra bedding. The photos do not due justice to how spacious it is, with very large TV and leather recliners. Kitchen and bathroom were great, and loved the awesome shower. Thanks so much for having us,
Jamie

Great place! I felt right at home, this home had everything I needed and more! I had the pleasure of meeting Tom and his wife in passing and they were wonderful people. I would definitely stay again and I recommend anyone that is going to be in the area to check this place out…. You won’t be disappointed!

If you are looking for a peaceful setting in nature to relax and recharge, Izzy Inn is the place! The cabin is incredibly spacious with a wall that collapses opening the entire space to the screened-in porch. The cabin is incredibly modern with tons of bells and whistles. Communication with Tom and the entire family was superb. All of my questions were answered promptly and with kindness. I highly recommend staying at Izzy Inn. To be able to simply relax, rewind and recharge while being surrounded by the sounds and beauty of nature is an incredible remedy! Thank you, Tom and Family, and of course Izzy!

I reserved this for my wife, mother and sons. They found it to be wonderful. Host was super easy to work with, they were very proactive, and had everything set up and ready at checkin. We will definitely try to stay here again next time we're in the area!
Amazing place. Everything is exactly as described and very well kept up and clean. Great space and tons of activities to do for all ages. I would highly recommend.
This was the most amazing weekend stay we’ve ever had. There was no shortage of things to do, inside or out. Every detail and nook in the house was beautifully decorated and functionally perfect.
Beautiful home. Perfect for large groups. Super clean with plenty of space and things to do!
The senior class of Newtown Harris absolutely loved their time there!

This house exceeded all of our expectations. There was a lot to do for the kids and adults. The house was clean and had everything we needed. The host was extremely responsive. We hope to come back to this location again next year.
I’d say our group of 16 had the best time possible. No one of as bored everyone had personal space and the home was unbelievable. We will return for sure. Amazing communication and a clean home.
Great place with a lot of activities for a larger group

Absolutely perfect stay for a large group of families! Our kids enjoyed the basketball court and the pool while adults were able to relax around the fire pit. Hosts were extremely responsive throughout the whole weekend. Highly recommend!

We had a large group of people stay here and everyone absolutely loved it. At no point did anyone feel crowded or overwhelmed, there was so much space for everyone to enjoy themselves. We never got bored thanks to the pool, pickle back, billiards, basketball, wiffleball outside or just hanging out in 1 of the kitchens. The beds were all nice and slept all of us comfortably. The house is tucked away from the rest of the neighborhood in a wooded area and is gated which was very nice. This house was great and everyone said we needed to go back!

We booked this place for our extended family’s spring break. It was out of the ordinary as we live in the north and wanted to stay close to home this year instead of heading south. This place was perfect. Lots of great things to do for the kids and adults as well. The house was very clean and just as advertised. The pictures and descriptions are very accurate. All in all we had a great time and plenty of private space for everyone.

Cannot say anything negative about this rental or the host. The house was beautiful - just like the pictures. The warm pool, full basketball court and mini arcade room were something we could only dream of renting to have privately for ourselves. Within minutes of walking in, you felt right at home with a variety of bedrooms (with very comfortable beds/bedding) to suit any family's needs. 2 kitchens, endless bathrooms, 2 sets of washer/dryers and dish washers kept our large group beyond accommodated. It was secluded enough to feel like a true retreat yet minutes away from Notre Dame and major stores/restaurants. We have already talked about coming back and have recommended it to others. What a wonderful stay.

Incredible place to stay, especially for large groups.
Don was a great host, very responsive and communicative.
Property was even better in person than the photos! Very clean, with lots of fun activities, especially the indoor pool and gym.
Location was conveniently located near supermarkets, food and shopping.
Will definitely stay here again in the future!

We stayed at the home for our annual staff retreat. We spent our time working on planning for our non-profit's next fiscal year's work as well as spending time team building with one another. The house was perfect for both types of activities. We had room to spread out and have discussions in small groups. We were able to get breaks in the gym, pool, and outdoors. The house was spacious, clean, and provided the privacy we needed as a team. Instructions for both checking in and out were clear and they answered every question we had promptly. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Amazing stay that exceeded all our expectations. A+ communication from the host, and lots of attention to detail in the house. The house (villa?) was not only stylish and well-maintained but also exceptionally clean. The location was perfect, offering both convenience and plenty of privacy on it's own small forest of land. The incredible amenities made the stay truly memorable. This Airbnb truly exemplifies hospitality at its finest, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking an exceptional and memorable retreat.

If your family has grown and you have found it difficult for everyone to get together, this is the place to go. The 9 of bedrooms, 12 bathrooms, multiple kitchens, and especially the Gym and Pool, made this the perfect place for our entire family to come and reconnect and enjoy ourselves. It was even more than what we expected. The children had so much safe play time and the adults had time to just sit and talk and feel like a family again. I Highly recommend this property for any large group that wants to just have fun and enjoy quality time together. Everyone in our family wants to go back and do it again. Worth every single penny!!!

We had a group of 21 friends & family & this property worked wonderfully for us. It's very spacious with plenty of activities for all. 2 large kitchens near each other with plenty of cupboards & 4 refrigerators in house worked great for our large group. The basketball court was a unique treat- having pickleball was a bonus. The gaming area with video games & pool table was also great- & a fair bit of euchre was played in there. A lot of board games were played on the big kitchen tables. Lots of tvs with streaming options- had the Lions winning playoff game on throughout the house. Last but not least we loved the pool area & really enjoyed some extra warm temperatures in the room & the water itself. Matthew was very helpful & responsive to our needs.
Had a large gathering with multiple families and kids. Everyone loved the house, and there was so much to do for everyone! Indoor pool area was amazing!
Wonderful place and convenient for all ages. We and the kids love it.

Our family booked the house for a Christmas celebration in Dec. There were 11 adults and 8 kids (ages 13-3). The space was great for the group - with plenty of space for the kids to run around and the adults not hear them.
Unfortunately, there were a few kinks that put a bit of a damper on the weekend… the house would not unlock, the pool heater broke, & the house sound system didn’t work. Upon arrival, the management company was quick to respond and were able to unlock to door remotely, but then I was notified that the pool heater was not working. Extremely disappointing, since it was a main amenity that made us book the house. We were strung along on day one in hopes it could be fixed, but were informed late that day that it was a custom part and it’d be broken for the duration of our stay. Additionally, they noted the issues with the sound system were known.
Overall, it’s a nice house, they ended up comping part our stay for the issues, but not the glowing 5-stars I expected.

We had an excellent stay! We had 10 adults and 7 kids in our group and it was plenty of space. There is so much to do on site, a little something for everyone. The home is clean and comfortable. It was very well stocked compared to other Airbnbs that I have stayed in.

This home met and exceeded our expectations. The property was gorgeous, had all the amenities our group wanted, and the cleanliness was beyond what you expect in a vacation rental. The responsiveness of Don/Matt was helpful and quick. We thought all the spaces were functional and roomy. The kids said “this is the best house ever” and we ALL hope to be back next year.
Spectacular facility, perfect for a corporate event or a weekend with friends. It was well furnished, clean and the pool was very warm. Highly recommended.

We hosted a retreat here and Don's AirBNB was perfect. There is a ton of meeting space, nice roundtable feel for the kitchens, and the amenities helped us incorporate fun activities. The location is private and provides beautiful scenery. I would absolutely stay here again. No complaints!

If you want to stay at a place that will leave people in awe when they step through the front door, book this place! You won’t regret it! Had an absolute blast staying here with family! Will definitely try and stay here again!

Weather or time of year should not be a factor in booking. Lots to do right on property. Our group (20) used and enjoyed all of the features on the property. Great for multi family vacation or large group event. We will consider this for our next meeting.
Amazing place, somehow exceeded my lofty expectations. Host was extremely responsive and made everything super easy.

We found this home because we were looking for an indoor pool, but we got so much more than a great pool. The home is beautiful and really well taken care of. The bedrooms and bathrooms are spacious and high-end. We all enjoyed playing basketball and dodgeball in the gym and using the game room, backyard, and trampoline. The kitchen was well equipped, but we also ran into "town" and ordered food from nearby restaurants.
We were a large group of adults and children and everyone had something to do all day and plenty of privacy at night. The owner was super responsive when we had questions.
This home was amazing and we will definitely be coming back!

Amazing home that exceeded expectations!! Pictures don’t do this property justice. We had a group of 20 us from toddlers to grandparents. Everyone loved the home! Everything was new, modern and worked perfectly!
Pool and lounge area were a hit for the teens. The water temp was perfect.
We loved the indoor basketball court and game room. Enjoyed sitting outside in the evening by the fire pit with a private, peaceful view of the wooded area.
The tech in the home was a little challenge at the start for controlling the music and temperature, but Don was a super responsive host and we figured it out quickly.
Will definitely rent again if back in the area. Thanks Don!

Absolutely loved our stay in Niles. The house was clean and spacious, everyone in our large party had their own room and bathroom. The indoor pool, gym, and huge backyard kept everyone happy and busy. Will definitely be back again!
Great place to stay! I would highly recommend for a large group.
Excellent host, beautiful home, soooooo much fun! Worth every penny! Will be back!

First time using a Airbnb, and Joanie made it one of the best trips of my life. I was shocked at how kind, thorough, and accommodating Joanie was. Her place has to be the absolute best place to stay in the area, it was amazing. Literally zero bad things to say about everything, she made it the perfect vacation.

Joanie’s place was a peaceful respite in between a weekend of my daughter’s graduation activities. Since it was close to Saint Mary’s, my family often returned to Joanie‘s place after an activity to rest, eat, and get ready for the next activity. With the exception of a wood chipper next door that was run all through the night the first night, there was only pretty bird song and an occasional deer visitor. The full kitchen and BBQ space outside were perfect to prepare meals, the bathroom was spotless, and the washer and dryer were greatly appreciated so we could all fly home with clean clothes. The surroundings are beautiful!

Our stay at Harry’s apartment in Niles exceeded our expectations. We were attending a wedding at Hidden Vineyard Wedding Barn and wanted to find somewhere nearby, and this apartment was the perfect spot. We had no idea what to expect in Niles and we found it to be a super cute, quaint town with lots to explore. The apartment is nearby restaurants, coffee shops and dessert places. Super cute area. There was a carnival and live music going on in town which was fun to walk to. We loved the local recommendations from Harry like Iron Shoe Distillery. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and spacious. We felt very relaxed during our stay here and would highly recommend it for a weekend trip!
Very nice, easy access. Unit was clean and all was as described. Very much appreciate a great host!

This place was amazing! Nice and peaceful. Great location it was central to everything in town and within a 30 minute drive to the surrounding major cities. If I’m ever in the area again I will definitely stay here!

I have stayed before and Harry has always been helpful and accommodating. The unit is a beautiful modern update on a downtown historic building and is super charming, private and spotless! I visit Niles often and think that I have stayed at every Air B&B downtown near the river walk... I like that this is a single unit versus most that are broken up into multiple units. found it to be much quieter and felt more secure knowing I was the only person with access to the entrance. It was exactly what I hope an AB&B should be when I book. GREAT HOST, GREAT PROPERTY, GREAT LOCATION!..5 Thanks Harry, you have a beautiful property, I will be back!
Great stay at Harry’s place!

A perfect place for a mother/daughter weekend! The apartment was immaculate and exactly as described. We felt right at home. Harry was super responsive. We would not hesitate to go back again! What a gem of a find!
I stay in Niles frequently and this is easily my favorite location.

Great place with great location. Hosts had everything needed plus some! They left extra items food items such as fresh fruits, pizzas and yogurts and additional toiletries in case you forgot something! They really take the extra thought and time to do what they can to go above and beyond for their guests. Would definitely stay again!

I have stayed here several times now, these hosts are wonderful! The place is always clean and tidy, the hosts respond very quickly to my messages, and they are flexible when they can be to accommodate my work schedule. I really enjoy relaxing here after work, it’s just next to the river and right downtown next to shops and restaurants-all within walking distance. I’d recommend this spot to anyone staying in Niles. 🙂

My wife and I were in Niles Michigan for a weekend concert, and we decided to stay at Harry's place downtown Niles MI. A beautiful one bedroom apartment that exceeded our expectations. Easy to find and easy access. Convenient parking in the parking lot adjacent to the apartment entrance. Within walking distance to River Front Park, nice restaurants, coffee shop/bakery, and the Wonderful Theater, where they show current movies for $5 and popcorn for $2.
The apartment was spotlessly clean with functional furniture and a confirmable bed with with nice linens. A great Kitchen with everything we needed during our stay, and then some. Lot of special touches and attention to detail. Quick response time and a wonderful host. A first class operation, for sure. We will be back.

Have stayed multiple times and always an amazing visit.
clean, private, safe with parks and restaurants nearby.
One of my favorite AB&B in the area!
You won't regret booking at this property.
Place was great and worked perfectly for us. So nice to be able to walk around town and then easily get back to our comfortable Airbnb. Thanks Harry!

I have stayed here several times and always peaceful, spotless and safe.
easily one of my favorite locations in Niles.
1 block from river and city park, walking distance to restaurants and just a beautiful and comfortable space to stay.
Harry is a great host and always responsive.
I will be back.
☆☆☆☆☆
Harry’s apartment was clean and cozy. Comfortable bed. Quality bath products. Good coffee! In the heart of downtown.
Nice place to stay
The stay was amazing. It comfortably fit 2 people in the heart of Niles and had everything you could want out of a stay. The pictures truly don’t do it justice. I was truly captivated with my stay
Enjoyed our stay they really focus on making your stay enjoyable frozen pizza in freezer yogurt bagels and cream cheese yogurts and a few drinks in fridge so nice pla e is clean and safe
We had a great stay at Harry’s place! Private, spotless and awesome location! Will stay again!

My boyfriend and I were spending a quiet weekend away and this location was perfect! We had a great meal at the Iron Shoe Distillery and enjoyed browsing the area. We would absolutely return to Harry's great apartment!! It had everything we needed. Loved the cute kitchen and the bed was super comfy! Harry was the perfect host!

Felt right at home, excellent space, great light, comfortable furniture & bed.
Shower/bathroom has everything you need.

We had such a good stay at the downtown apartment. Being able to walk to shops and restaurants was so nice. My daughter (6-years-old) has complained each day since returning home that we cannot walk everywhere anymore. Harry was available via messaging whenever we had questions. The apartment was clean and fun.
Was a Great place at affordable price. Very welcomeing
Lovely, super clean, comfortable, welcoming, convenient place to stay in Niles. Excellent communication before and during my stay. I would definitely stay here again!
Amazing place,the hosts were so nice in accommodating our early check in.Such a rare find.Many thanks!
Great place: comfortable bed, great water pressure, cute fireplace. Will definitely stay again! 💜

I grew up in Niles and this is a good spot to stay when I am in town. The entry stairway is steep but well lit. Nice decorations. Two TCL Roku modern big screen smart TV's capable of automatically erasing personal info so you don't need to. We set the heat to 70 when we arrived and the modern heat pump did a good job. There was cold beer and pop in the fridge, fresh fruit on the island and a frozen pizza in the freezer. We had a beer and a Vernor's and left a beer. We were dining out so had plenty of leftover's so the pizza is still up for grabs. The bathroom and shower we good with a serious vent fan and the towel's were great. Big dispensing jugs of shampoo, conditioner and body wash. The bed is firm the way I like it and my wife was comfortable. The couch is tolerable and easy to get up from.
A lot of cool decoration items and baskets with sundries if you need it. I will stay here in the future.
This was an immaculate apartment. We felt right at home. We highly recommend this Air Bnb.

This was one of our favorite stays so far.We travel the country and will for sure not forget our times in Niles.Such a fun location! Harry was a great communicator and they really made us feel at home.
I had a great stay. It was private, clean and nicely decorated. The Host provided clear instructions and local recommendations.
The space was so cute and absolutely perfect for a sweet little getaway. I cannot wait to go back!
clean safe little nest. enjoyed our stay

We had a great stay here! Cozy apartment with everything we needed, plus some very thoughtful extra elements sprinkled throughout. My friends and I sat around the table drinking tea and reminiscing. The bed was also very comfortable and we appreciated the extra sleeping options. The host anticipated our needs well and we felt really at home.
Great stay, comfortable place and good location. Thanks to the hosts for the special touches. Will definitely come back.

I can't even express how much I like this space.
It's private, quiet, charming remodel of a historic building, spotless, comfortable, easy access to restaurants and parks.
I think this is my 4th visit to this property, and for sure, not my last.
If you are visiting Niles for business or just a cozy getaway, you will not be disappointed in Harry's Property OR his hospitality!
Tidy, toiletries provided, convenient location and very clear instructions/easy to contact host

My son was on fall break and I decided on a last minute stay. I wasn’t familiar with the area but read about salmon fishing/antiques in the area. We only stayed one night but it was perfect for our needs. Easy instructions for access to unit/parking next door. Bait shop very helpful told us where to go/Berrien Springs. Beautiful area. The unit was very clean. Thorough/thoughtful host. Great shower pressure/nice towels. Coffee beans grinder. Snacks- water/beer/frozen pizza/fruit bars. Very comfortable bed/fluffy pillows. Plenty of extra blankets. Son said the sofa was comfortable. Thick curtains- room stays dark in the morning. Antique mall across the street. Lots of shops/restaurants within walking distance. River walk/beautiful within walking distance from this Airbnb. Thank you Stephanie.

Niles was my hometown so
I was familiar and excited about the downtown location.
Harry was very proactive with apartment & local information plus ample warnings of the entrance steps (FYI: my 87yr old mom was able to slowly climb them).
The apartment was decorated to be homey, comfortable and supplied with anything needed.
The fireplace was a bonus for a cool rainy weekend.
We would gladly stay here again.
This place was great! Everything was clean and the amenities were a fun bonus. The space feels big & modern yet cozy w/the electric fireplace lighting. Would definitely stay again!

3rd stay at this location (see previous reviews for more details)
*accommodating and responsive host.
* spotless clean.
*private
* restaurants and city park only a short walk.
Thanks for another great stay.

Harry was a great host! Cute 1 bedroom; 1 bath. Lots of little extras - oatmeal; waters and beer among other things waiting for us. We loved the coffee/breakfast place across the street - amazing food coffee and very reasonable. Convenient to Notre Dame on a busy football weekend!

The hosts were communicative before and during our stay, which was great. The entry instructions were clear and easy to follow, and the unit was clean and cozy. The location was perfect for our quick trip and we would definitely stay here again!

This was my 2nd stay at this property in 2 weeks.
*Please read last week's review for my initial thoughts on my first stay.
The property is clean, stylish, and VERY PRIVATE.
It is only a block and a half from the river walk and a nice park and plenty
of eating options within walking distance.
Whether visiting for a Notre Dame game, business, or a quiet getaway, you will love this property.

I booked as a last minute trip to Niles and the host was helpful and accommodating.
The unit is a beautiful modern update on a downtown historic building and is super charming, private and spotless!
I visit Niles often and think that I have stayed at every Air B&B downtown near the river walk... I liked that this is a single unit versus most that are broken up into multiple units. I found it to be much quieter and felt more secure knowing I was the only person with access to the entrance.
It was exactly what I hope an AB&B should be when I book.
GREAT HOST, GREAT PROPERTY, GREAT LOCATION!.... 5☆
Thanks Harry, you have a beautiful property, I will be back!
Awesome location!!! Quiet neighborhood within walking distance to places to eat. Awesome host!

We had a great stay. Breakfasts at Downtown Niles Cafe and The Wine Bar both walkable. Great dinner at Iron Shoe Distillery. Beautiful bike path nearby (rode to South Bend) and also riverfront park where ate ice cream from Swirly’s. The apartment was really nice. Good bed and comfortable living room for watching Netflix. Didn’t use the kitchen except for popping pop corn that was included. Also water bottles and even packets of oatmeal and a frozen pizza. Overall highly recommend.

This was a very affordable Airbnb. It was clean and have a list of things to do in walking distance. Other towns and beaches were in reasonable driving distance. This was a wonderful place to stay with my family.

The Lily Pad was perfect for our needs. Family from 4 different parts of the country. We were able to hang out and relax, we were conveniently located for the ND campus. We look forward to coming back!
Great location for a Notre dame game. Great to wake up to a beautiful lake. Great restaurants nearby. Come wary and stay late!

We loved our stay at Lauren's Lillypad Cottage! The deck was amazing, so close to the water and awesome sandy beach. Entrance to the water was very shallow which would be nice for little ones. The inside of the home was just as shown, elevated decor, spotlessly clean and had every amenity we needed. The space is very large, and open but also had nice quiet areas perfect for reading a book, or for afternoon naps. We walked just a block away to Wagners Lakeside Grill for great local fish as well as other great options. I can't say enough about this little slice of heaven, but that we can't wait to return and make more memories.

Had a great time! The house is perfect for a little get away! We enjoyed the private beach on a quiet lake- the host had multiple floats/paddle boards available to use. The house was well stocked with kitchen appliances/dishes and had ample beach/bathroom towels. The host, Lauren, was extremely kind and responded quickly! I would highly recommend staying here if you are looking to spend some time at the lake!

We had a fantastic getaway with our puppy! The place had everything you could need and beach front access. We loved going for a walk each morning, lounging at the beach during the day and making dinner on the grill every night.
Lauren gave some great recommendations for wine tasting, local restaurants and coffee shops. We found a nearby dog park one afternoon and our pup loved it.
We loved the house and everything about the trip. It was so easy to communicate with Lauren and everything was as she described it. We look forward to staying another time!
Photos don’t do this place justice! Great stay … wonderful experience!
Loved the set up of the place, very cool! We enjoyed our stay very much. 10/10
Very clean and comfortable
Loved it! would definitely stay again

This place here was/is fantastic. A great place to enjoy your stay. Highly recommended. Beautiful aesthetically and a great place for multiple people. Very good use of space. I would stay here every time, if available. Keep up the good work.
Great place to stay!
Had a great time as usual
Great place to stay. I’ve stayed here before and I’d stay here again. The best part are the amazing bathrooms.
Was clean, quiet, and comfortable!! The host was very responsive and very pleasant!!!
Super cute little place near the water.
Great experience, would visit again.
We enjoyed our stay. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The loft space was fun for my kids. The coffee bar was a nice feature. Would stay here again!
Been here multiple times. Love the instant comfortability and privacy. Beautiful downtown Riverwalk setting, great for walks.
Place was very cozy!

The place lived up to the title, it was unique in a good way. It's in a very peaceful location on a river and very close to a delicious Italian cafe which has great coffee and pastries. Inside it was super cozy and the interior decorating was done meticulously with great taste. Really enjoyed the place. Thank you!
Such a unique surprise in my home town loved the stay.
great place to stay, will stay again!
Great place to stay will stay again. Very clean and quiet.
have stayed at this location many times always a pleasant visit

This place was a true gem! Everything was so clean & we loved the decor! The lofts & upstairs common areas were beautiful! The beds were comfy & the showers were awesome with their rainfall shower heads!
We never got connected to wifi. It kept kicking us off when trying to sign in, so that was disappointing. I phoned our host to get clarification, but it still did not ever connect. We were only there 1 night or I would have contacted the host again.
Be sure to look at all of the photographs so you understand where to enter! Also, look for the text from your host for your door code, etc., as the one listed through the airbnb app was different than the text we received! I can see how that could become confusing.
We walked to 2nd & Main Coffee Shop (awesome) & The Rage (food was decent & the building is cool)! The river trails were also a great walk!
The only thing we thought we could have used, was a bit more light in the TV area. Not a deal breaker though! We HIGHLY recommend!
perfect spot with everythingyou need
Great peaceful spot for a good price
We really enjoyed our stay — it was clean, pleasant, and peaceful. The host gave us fantastic breakfast recommendations which we appreciated!

This was a great! The cleanest AirBnb I have ever been to and I have experienced some very clean ones. The rooms were simple charm and very minimalistic. There is a common area that provides coffee. The room had a microwave and a mini fridge. It was also very accessible and I would stay here again.
Our second stay at this location and it was super comfortable. The housekeeper was really sweet also.

We had a great stay at this property! We were in the area to attend a Notre Dame football game and it was an easy 18-minute drive to campus. Great value for the location. It was very clean and in a quiet and safe neighborhood. Sage was an awesome host - very responsive to all questions. Easy check in. We loved the coffee bar - just what needed first thing in the morning!
Great location and beautiful views! It’s a great place to spend a weekend
Unique stays was very helpful and responsive. Great place!!
very clean and neat, right on the river, next to many restaurants and cafes. Enjoyed my stay here very much
was beautiful.. it was perfect for the
VERY clean and good communication.
Highly recommend!
Worth every penny! It was a great place to stay. I would definitely stay here again.
We came to stay here on a trip to northern Michigan. Access was very easy, the area was spacious and clean, and we were very satisfied.

Very clean, cute, affordable stay! Just as described and clear instructions regarding check in and use of TV. Lots of space we fit 6 comfortably! Not much to do surrounding but there is a river and it’s close to nearby beaches!
Host was a great help and very kind. The place is remarkable and definitely worth the money.
Unique stay was a wonderful vacation away from home. I will be back
Very clean! Comfortable beds and nice bathrooms. There is a brewery and distillery within a 2-3 minute walk so we were happy! Would definitely stay again

We really enjoyed our stay at Uniques Stays, it was in close proximity to Life Action Camp where we were each day as well the local Walmart and grocery stores. If you are looking for a unique experience, don't hesitate to book this spot, regardless of the season!
we had a lovely time. it was a cute set up. we sat by the fire for awhile and took a moonlight walk through the garden. we would definitely recommend staying here for something new!
Delightful.
What an incredible experience, this place was truly magical just like the humans hosting. Can’t thank ya’ll enough!
This was our first time glamping, and we will definitely do it again. Lots of privacy, and we'll maintained. Worth every penny, even in cold weather! Love it! Thank you.
We loved it!

I could go on and on!! This place was adorable & affordable! We absolutely loved it! It really is the small details that make it the best! Like my name on the chalkboard when we got there. Everything is so well stocked even ice and water! Heated yurt. Lots of extra blankets SUPER cumfy. Even the bathroom (compost) was incredibly impressive! But the property itself was the highlight! They have alpacas, chickens, a small park, vollyball sand, a super inventive basketball free throw game, the most beautiful yoga spot I ever seen and hiking trails! Pet friendly!! The old blue bus is seriously so beautiful and charming. The place is great in the day but WAIT TILL DARK! Everything is lit up. I would love to see the lights go even further into the woods to light up the full walking trail. This place was great and I CAN NOT WAIT to come back! Hosts were so kind and down to earth. Very responsive. Even offering a tour in the morning but we left out early. Must return!! So worth every penny
The yurt was SUCH a great find! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a peaceful stay.
This place is magical. I wish we had more time to stay. Melissa is a wonderful host. The accommodations were perfect. I will definitely book again.

We stay here every year on our way from CO to NY. It is the perfect half way spot to relax and refresh. All the added amenities this year make the space a true glamping experience, and were much appreciated. A hot shower after being in the car 18 hours, worth every penny.
She responded to everything very quickly and even gave me a refund when I accidentally double booked! Beautiful land with lots of walking space which was great for our dog! Thanks for the stay

One of my most favorite glamping experiences, by far. Such a beautiful, unique, peaceful setting located right outside of town, nestled in the trees. From the flower fields to the great camp spot set up’s, walking the beautifully lit paths at night. A great place to be, relax and unwind. A truly magical spot.

This was the perfect weekend getaway destination. When I arrived I was welcomed by a sign with my name on it and hand picked flowers. The glamping “tent” was beautifully decorated with string lights and had a comfortable bed. Loved spending time by the fire at night, which was easy to make thanks to the provided fire kit, and picking wildflowers during the day. Melissa has gone above and beyond to create a location that is both comfortable and peaceful. I can’t wait to come back!
Super beautiful. Really really good vibes

This yurt set up is fantastic!! It's definitely camping, but the way Melissa had everything you could possibly need right there for you was amazing! If you want to go camping, be very comfortable, and not carry any equipment with you at all- this is the place!
Melissa was also amazing in letting us meet the alpaca gang ❤️
This was such a nice retreat with a lot of thought put into the area. Would stay again!

I was looking for a place to take a solo retreat and thought this place looked like a good blend of nature while not spending all the time and effort of camping, and boy was I right! It was incredibly peaceful and restorative! Melissa was a great host and made accommodations for my stay!

We had a great time at Blooming Bus Farms! The yurt and site were beautiful and clean. The hosts have really thought of everything you could possibly need. From the gorgeous flowers, to lounging in the hammock, sitting by the fire, shooting hoops and hiking around the grounds, it really is an awesome escape from the hustle and bustle of Chicago! Waking up and seeing alpacas parading past your site (bandanas and all) was something else! We bought their farm fresh eggs and honey, both delicious :). Melissa and her husband are salt of the earth people and have an awesome space for relaxation/enjoying nature without the set-up and take-down of traditional tent camping. Highly recommend this place for a weekend getaway or an event in a unique space. We will be back!

We loved our stay in the glamping tent. We didn't meet Melissa in person but the communication over the Airbnb messages went really well. The glamping site had everything we needed. The sleeping tent was surprisingly spacious, very clean and cozy. As there are nets on the doors and windows there were no insects in the tent. There were some spiders in the bathroom tent, but you're in nature. We had a nice BBQ on the firepit and watched the fireflies. In the night it was really quiet so we had a good rest. For everyone who likes glamping we strongly recommend staying here!

A great spot to catch a reprieve on our drive. We loved the fire pit and having everything ready have fire. The shower is nice and hot. My dog loved have the freedom to sniff around and explore. Melissa and her farm are lovely
we had the most magical time! the bed was comfortable, the little touches like flowers and a welcome sign were so sweet! 10/10 recommend and will likely be back!
Melissa and family were great and very friendly! We appreciate the hospitality!
What a lovely place! Definitely recommend.
A perfect getaway! Not only did Melissa make sure we had everything we needed, but the site was adorable and the bed was soooo comfortable.

This place is absolutely BEAUTIFUL and reminded me of the beauty that Michigan holds that I often take for granted. Very quiet, spacious and so cute! Very comfortable and the PERFECT glamping getaway. Melissa and her family are absolutely beautiful people inside and out and did nothing shy of making us feel welcome. We even got to meet their Alpaca family! Also, it was so refreshing being able to take my dog somewhere that does not discriminate certain breeds.
I absolutely cannot wait to stay again💝
great place

The stay was nice, I wish that there would have been wipes or hand sanitizer or something. I thought it was a fair assumption that there would be something like that if the composting toilet tent was a part of the advertising, and it's referred to as "glamping". Otherwise, it was nice that they had a cooler there with a full bag of ice and waters and plenty of wood for a fire.

A great stay! Really helpful directions to navigate our way there even in the dark. The weather was cold, but we were perfectly warm in the yurt! Woke up to fresh snow - it was a beautiful and magical experience!
Perfect glamping experience, Definitely want to return during spring or summer to see the flowers,
We had such a wonderful time at Melissa’s property! We can’t wait to return!
Melissa was a fantastic host. The whole experience was incredibly easy and the wh camping site was perfectly set up to accommodate a comfortable and enjoyable trip. Would absolutely stay again.
An excellent place to stay! Lovely people, well thought out and excited to visit again and see the progression of their regenerative farming.
The stay was amazing and relaxing. The yurt was very clean and homely. There are many great things to do at the sight and close by. A place that feels like home away from home.

This was my second visit and I think that speaks volumes! I was so surprised to see all the flower gardens for first time. This is a delightful, peaceful place and the hosts are so kind and helpful. I can't wait to return in the fall.

Can’t say enough good things about our stay. We had such a relaxing time and any questions we had about things to do in town, fun suggestions, etc were answered promptly and perfectly. Ended up checking out a farmers market in New Buffalo on Sunday and popping into some great shops and restaurants in Three Oaks. Highly recommend. Wish we could have stayed a few more nights. Everything was perfect
So cute and everything you could need is provided!

I highly recommend staying here. Melissa was a wonderful host! We had such a good time! It was beautiful and so nice to be out in nature while still having a nice place to sleep and even shower! We will definitely be returning
Very beautiful space & had everything you need!

Highly recommend this experience for anyone! This was our first time taking our boys camping and we are hooked. The amount of care and attention to details that Melissa put into our stay was amazing. From a personalized sign and fresh flowers, to rugs, linens and lighting in the yurt. I was apprehensive about the compostable toilet, but even that was a pleasant experience. We enjoyed our stay and we are looking forward to our next one.

Our first time glamping completely exceeded my expectations. I forgot warm pajamas and panicked because I’m always freezing, but the yurt was so cozy and I was very warm. Lots of sweet touches, extremely well thought out and overall a magical experience for us and our 4 yo. Meeting the alpacas and playing badminton were highlights too!

The campsite came jam packed with not only the essentials but with ways too keep us entertained. I couldn't have been more excited to face my cousins in Beach volleyball and badminton. I can definitively see myself coming back, if not this year then next year for sure.
Such a cute place! I can't wait to come back with my kids.

I loved this experience so much. Melissa was such a warm and prompt communicator. The site had everything I needed (bug spray, flashlight, lantern, tinder, firewood, lighter, etc.). I loved the compost toilet and portable shower option. There were thunderstorms both nights that I camped, but my pup, and I were so cozy in the yurt. The site is on a beautiful urban farm with a few other glamp sites set up. That said, I felt like I had plenty of privacy. Cannot recommend this spot enough!
Great experience!
Its was great! They had everything set up waitin for us an even lit our camps tourches. It was lovely!! Definitely recommend
This was such a fun little getaway! Everything was described perfectly and it was nice to have some peace and quiet.

This place is perfect. What a great experience. We've never 'glamped' before, but I think we're spoiled now. The tent was immaculate. Every little detail was thought of: wine opener, bug spray, a little fan to keep us cool, kindling for the fire, a lighter to get the wood pile started (which was pre-set in the fire grate for us!), a cooler with ice and water already chilled, soap provided at the dishwashing/handwashing station, a little generator for charging phones... I mean, it was insane how well set up this place was. And the bed! So comfy. That mattress was a dream. We wish we could have stayed longer, but we were just passing through on our way to Colorado. If we're ever in Michigan again we'll be sure to hang out here. Truly, it was great. Thanks, Melissa!
Great place and great host! This place is perfect if you want to enjoy nature at the comfort of your home. Good location too! It is like a forest within a city.
Such a fun place to visit and all was exactly as described. Go out and relax in the trees!
Melissa was a great host who was very quick to respond and provided all the basics. The water was a little chilly in the shower, but it was totally usable and the rest of the stay was magical.
Such a fun camping trip! Amenities were very comfortable. We had a blast!
This place was the perfect campfire get away! Will be coming back and recommending to everyone! If it’s warm though I definitely recommend bringing a fan since it gets very warm.

From first glance it’s small, once inside it opens up and feels very spacious. Might be one of the better beds I’ve laid in (girlfriends #1). Everything was great, would visit again!

This was my very first glamping experience! And I really really loved it! The place was very cozy and warm! It was in the middle of the forest which I really enjoyed!
I highly recommend this place and I will definitely come back again when it’s warmer!

We had a great experience even though it was raining and snowing. We stayed very warm under all the blankets that Melissa provided. Perfect getaway from the chaos of life. Beautiful setup. There was water and ice for us to us along with plenty of wood for the fire. Will definitely be back! 😄

We wanted the experience of staying in the yurt and booked spontaneously. It was my first time being away from my kids and really just a wonderful little weekend getaway. The portapotty was convenient too :-) we enjoyed looking around niles and shopping through some antique stores. I have no complaints about this stay :)
Great location and value. Close enough to everything you’ll need while still experiencing nature and the outdoors. Their pristine yurt offers a fun and unique camping experience!

Lovely stay! Enjoyed it thoroughly. Great hospitality, with firewood, torches, a heating blanket and heater. Loved the Niles downtown area and hiking. Recommend staying here and also, go visit Apothica Teas!
Such a great experience, so unique, private, and plenty to explore around a bit! I would recommend it as a getaway to anyone looking for something unique and magical!
Want a place to relax get away form everything this is your place.
The fire was lit, the space heater was on, everything was cozy and inviting which was perfect considering the weather was cold and rainy. It was dreamy

This was a unique and low key getaway…exactly what I was looking for! Super fun in the winter. Introduced my two daughters to glamping. Tiki torches and a fire going upon our arrival. Try it!!

Yurt was exactly as described, if not better. Melissa had excellent communication and provided everything we needed for a great short stay. Would definitely come back in the warmer months but even with snow on the ground it was perfect.
This was exactly what i was expecting and what I needed. Beautiful place and property. I live in a city so I most appreciated the quiet and privacy. I plan to return, no matter the season.
This place is great. Especially for anyone wanting something different, and with a sense of adventure. The host is extremely accommodating as well
The yurt made for great weekend camping on a roadtrip. My aussie loved romping through the woods. We'd stay again!
Very cute! About 60 degrees inside on a night around 17 degrees. Absolutely perfect under the blankets and with the electric blanket 🤗

The yurt was wonderful! It was warm and comfortable, even in the middle of December. Plenty of blankets and firewood. Secluded, but still close to town to get anything that is needed. Will definitely stay again!

Perfect place to get away from it all. The yurt was amazing. The bed was very comfortable. The host were wonderful and had everything covered that you would need. I will definitely be coming back! 10 out of 10 in every way.
Excellent place & host!! Thank you :)

Perfect glamping spot! We were pleasantly surprised to see a porta john when we pulled up and Melissa gave a heads up they were able to get heat to the yurt. We cant wait to go back for another stay. One night wasn't enough!
We loved this little boho getaway!

We loved our stay! Melissa has thought of everything. It was perfect spot for our trip.
The yurt and campsite was clean. It was a cold, wet weekend however we stayed warm and dry.
Cannot wait to come back to see the sunflowers!

Perfect space. Highly recommend. Melissa is super about communication. We arrived late and like others mentioned she had the space lit up with torches and a fire going. It was so relaxing sitting there enjoying a fire we didn’t have to start! Nice touches all the way through.
Best getaway ever! So cute and comfortable. We will definitely be returning next year when the sunflowers are in bloom! 11/10
Melissa and the property were absolutely amazing! Definitely worth checking out and I will be staying there again soon
Great hosts. Everything as expected. Comfy and nice!

SO BEAUTIFUL & clean. We enjoyed our stay even with the rain. The hammocks, my gosh! Love it! I brought my little one along and she had so much fun. a little fairy like setting! absolutely gorgeous and the photos don’t do it justice!! the yurt was so much bigger than expected! you are provided with all your extra needs like extra water, a sink, towels, extra blankets, and bug spray! melissa has done such a good job with making sure you have everything!

very secluded and peaceful! bed is super comfortable and the comforter keeps you incredibly warm! toilets and shower were super clean and roomy also. it’s the perfect place for a glamping getaway!

So beautiful. Don’t know where to start! I never wanted to get off of the hammocks. I brought my toddler along and she had so much fun. There was a sand pit area we played in, tons of fun. Every time we are in town we try and book… this place is a little piece of heaven so quiet and magical… a very romantic get away for the misses and me.. Melissa always has the place lit up and everything ready to go including ice for the cooler😊 always clean and stocked with everything you could possibly need .. all you have to do is stop and grab some beer.. something to throw on the grill and stuff to make s’mores 😉

My husband and I stayed here to go to the ND football game and it was so inviting and comfortable! I would love to come back and just spend the weekend there at the campsite. It was cool and rainy and we could not have been more comfortable with the sleeping arrangements. Hope to visit again soon!
This was the best air bnb I have ever seen. The pictures really don't do it justice. I would 100/10 recommend and will be coming back next time I'm in town!

Melissa is an incredible host. The camp was prepared and well maintained upon arrival and throughout my stay. The area is safe and secluded yet there’s so much to do around there! The yurt was a dream! So comfortable and cozy. I hadn’t slept so well in months. Bugs were minimum, the shower water was warm and the toilet clean. Amazing site and would definitely recommend.
Great host. We were late and still the place was set up perfectly. Everything from the fire to the bed made this Camping without all the work and discomfort. We would do it again. Fun adventure.

If we had the occasion to come back, I would strongly consider staying here again.
Great place. Very clean. Would highly recommend.
Everything was so amazing and they were so sweet! Definitely will back.
This space was gorgeous and just as expected! Ulrike was an excellent host and very communicative. Clean, cozy, and well decorated. I’d recommend this place to anyone and hope to be back!

We had an excellent stay! Ulrike went above and beyond! The place was clean, clutter free and a great location for what we were looking for! We will definitely be back! Thank you again for such an amazing stay!
Beautiful lodge styled loft. Private and peaceful. Restaurants in downtown just a short walk away. Host was great. Would absolutely stay here again.

great stay. thank you

The place was just as clean and cozy as the pictures showed! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS SPOT! Its location was perfect for walkability and right next door to the best coffee shop ever! This apartment was incredible. The space is very warm and comfortable. Everything you need and more! The apartment is right in town and walking distance to everything in town. Ulrike and Lindsey were super responsive and left us a bottle of champagne as a welcome gift. Excellent stay!

Absolutely fantastic experience. I stayed there the night before my wedding at the Morris Estate and it was absolutely perfect.

It was honestly so peaceful and a beautiful place to stay. We saw a lot of wild life. The pictures don’t do it justice for how beautiful the home is inside and outside. We will 100% be going back.

Best surprise retreat for my honey for his 33rd birthday. We loved it here and could have stayed forever. This was an excellent property for a refueling getaway with my so! The property is tucked away in the woods with lots of privacy and a beautiful view. We especially loved the cozy fireplace, as we stayed in most of our trip. We’ll definitely be back!
Perfect place for my family, we are coming back summer time

I stayed here for 30 days and strongly recommend the house and the hosts. The house is a large, gracious, 170 year old home -- either the oldest house in town or pretty close to it. The house is wonderful to explore and even after a few weeks I was still finding nooks and crannies, furniture or wood trim, or other really interesting features. Yes the house is 170 years old and the hosts have not owned it for very long. You will not be staying in a brand new luxury hotel -- but Nancy and Josh have done everything possible to make a stay comfortable. They've never really lived in the house yet they've put every possible device and cooking implement in the kitchen. The beds are incredibly comfortable, the sheets and towels are new, the AppleTV provides an assortment of premium channels -- I could go on, but the hosts have done so much to make sure guests are comfortable. The air conditioning systems are being updated, but I stayed in the house during a heat wave in July and the house was sufficiently cool. In fact Nancy was so concerned she purchased upgrades to the cooling in the bedrooms during my stay. The house has a spectacular back yard (huge) that my dog loved. The house is also conveniently located. I walked my dog around the neighborhood and always felt safe and got to know several of my neighbors. The house has some quirks because of its age, but none of them would detract from a stay -- plus you get to stay in a beautiful and majestic 170 year old home with gracious and generous hosts.
